title: Physical origin of giant excitonic and magneto-optical responses in two-dimensional ferromagnetic insulators
excerpt: This paper uses first-principles method to demonstrate the important excitonic effects in optical and magneto-optical properties in 2D magnetic insulators.
citation: M. Wu, Z. Li, T. Cao, and S. G. Louie. "Physical origin of giant excitonic and magneto-optical responses in two-dimensional ferromagnetic insulators" Nat. Commun. . 10, 2371 (2019).
